header.presentation: Hello, my name is Alfonso Salces, I am a web developer specialized in Front-End. I have worked in different companies on projects for both education and banking sector.

skill.responsive: The designs I make are completely responsive, adapted to the latest measurement standards of the different devices that exist today.
skill.modular: Each designed application will be modular, and therefore each part will be reusable, both the modules and their respective components.
skill.planning: I am aware that thorough planning is the main force behind any successful project, therefore I always plan down to the smallest detail in the projects in which I participate.
